name: Dungeon Blocks
description:
Dungeon Blocks is a block pushing puzzle game inspired by the classics Binary Land and Sokoban. Control two adventurers at the same time. Guide them through deadly dungeons on their quest to defeat the Demon Lord!

Features:
- Simple controls with d pad on the gamepad or arrow keys on the keyboard to move.
- 30 progressively challenging levels.
- Reset the level at any time.
- Controller support.
